info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CALDWELL COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Blowing Rock, or 4 miles southwest of Darby, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, Kings Creek, and Upton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
